Now that she's grown and working for her family's factory, Lucia dreams of running her own atelier. Little does she know her ambition is about to get a jump start when her friend Dahlia comes by looking for someone to produce a specialized clothing item. Next thing she knows, Lucia is suddenly the head manager of the newly established Magical Garment Factory! Her unexpected appointment to this large role lands her in the crosshairs of others' jealousy, but the target on her back is but a bump in the road to realizing her dream! In addition to her duties, Lucia, in her own fashion, tackles the conundrums posed by the clients of the Tailors' Guild. There, he meets a group of college students, Beniko, Midori, Shun and Soukichi, who form their own winner's circle, a group of people who bet on horses not for entertainment but as a form of income. Nanao has no knowledge of horse betting but his ability to see the smallest of details in the horses shocks the members and he is allowed to join the club. I, Amekawa Shintarou, don’t get along with Haruna Natsuki, my childhood friend that lives next to me. When we were younger, we were so close that we promised to marry each other, but I got addicted to an FPS game, and I gradually distanced away from Natsuki. Before long, our relationship ended where we would talk harshly to each other every time we meet.

One day, I had to give printouts to Natsuki who left school early, and I got to enter her room for the first time in 5 years. However, she wasn’t there, and instead I found an expensive gaming PC. Displayed on its screen was the post-battle result of an FPS game I’ve been playing for years. At that time, I was surprised by her kill count and her username.

No way…there’s no way…

Due to her ability to infinitely synchronize with other AI robots, she can observe the private lives of many humans. Cha Cha despairs over what she sees in human society and develops something similar to depression and lethargy. Ai, CEO of White Island Nursing Home, purchases the decrepit Cha Cha from the government, brings her to the nursing home, shakes her out of her stupor, and ultimately convinces her to become Earth's next "Mother." in a futuristic society where people have become cold and calculating machines and AI robots take over many services once performed by human beings, Cha Cha, Ai, and the other AI robots force us to examine what it means to be human.

One day, while at work, she suddenly receives a gift from a handsome stranger, a young university student. Her co-workers are all in a frenzy, but Ranko, who has no idea what's going on, keeps her cool. At home, however, a terrible problem is brewing. Viscount Chounabashi's family wants to marry Ranko. In fact, their grandfathers have promised to marry their grandchildren to each other. However, Ranko, who enjoys her work and is not interested in marriage yet, refuses, but her parents, who want to keep up appearances, push her to go to the Chounabashi family. title: Toki no Houmonsha
synopsis:
It all begins with an odd encounter at night in a park. Touko-chan is walking home from a convenience store when she comes across a handsome guy who looks a bit strange. What he says when he sees her is even more strange. He asks her wat month, day, and year it is! Touko things this guy is really weird, but she answers his question and goes along her way.

The very next day she encounters that strange guy again. This time he is a new transfer student in her class! His name is KAIBARA Jin, and he acts as if he has no memory of meeting Touko at all. Jin is very cute, and all the girls in Touko’s class like him a lot. Touko, however, still thinks he is odd, and she can feel him looking at her sometimes, though she has a hard time catching him at it. But she doesn’t have much time to dwell on the new student.

Touko is busy trying to deal with some awful school bullying. After accusing her of stealing someone’s boyfriend (something she didn’t do) all the girls in her class have been playing mean tricks on Touko. It’s the usual Japanese school bullying — Scrawling unpleasant remarks in her class notebooks, putting needles and thumbtacks in her indoor school shoes, ignoring her, that sort of thing. Touko quietly puts up with it all, and really only manages to cope thanks to the loyal friendship of her friend Miyuki. Miyuki is the only one who ignores all the bullying and remains friends with Touko.

Enduring the cruelty is a pain, and Touko can sometimes sense that Jin is observing her and knows what is going on. He too, doesn’t seem to mind being friendly to Touko in spite of her outcast status. Jin is very mysterious, and has a sort of unusual aura around him, like Touko can sense something different. However, because Jin is cute and pupular, his attention and friendliness towards Touko only causes her more problems. Jealous of her, the other girls increase their bullying, and it gets to a point where they threaten Touko’s life by hanging her out a window!

But then something really odd happens. Jin steps in, claiming that Touko is about to die there. How exactly does he know this? The other girls were just being mean, and had no intention to actually kill Touko. But Jin knows what will happen. Why? He claims that he is actually from the 23rd century, and he is there to save her! How can anyone possibly believe that?! Then again, he did ask such a strange question when they first met. Is Jin really from the future? Would Touko really have died there, and why would he want to save her? Strange things seem to happen around Jin, he may possibly be telling the truth….

Thus begins the adventures of Touko and her bodyguard who may or may not be from the future!

Taken from Emily's Random Shoujo Manga Page

The story revolves around Ryouko Yakushiji, a 27-year-old multilingual investigator that graduated from Tokyo University's elite Department of Law, and the bizarre cases she faces while working for the Tokyo Metropolitan Police. Yakushiji not only has to deal with supernatural beings in her line of work, but also her rival Yukiko Muromachi, another equally talented and beautiful police investigator.

(Source: ANN)

title: Shoujo, Akuma to Naru ni wa

synonyms: How To Become A Demon Girl

synopsis: The story of a demon and a girl trying to become a demon no matter what the cost.

title: Densou Dorothy
synopsis:
A popular idol, Haruki, is the star of a commercial for an immersive virtual reality game called “Yellow Brick Road”. To help with the promotion of the game, his manager persuades him to enter the game as a “guardian” and defeat a band of thieves. However, Haruki encounters an adventure he never could have imagined!

(Source: The Zero Alliance)

title: Inkaden Abe Sada
synopsis: "Sada Abe (阿部 定 Abe Sada, May 28, 1905 – after 1971) was a Japanese woman, a geisha and prostitute, who erotically asphyxiated her lover, Kichizō Ishida (石田 吉蔵), on May 18, 1936, and then cut off his penis and testicles and carried them around with her in her kimono. The story became a national sensation in Japan, acquiring mythic overtones, and has been interpreted by artists, philosophers, novelists and filmmakers. Abe was released after having served five years in prison and went on to write an autobiography." (from Wikipedia: Abe Sada)

alternative_titles.ja: となりのお姉さん 同棲編

title: Kojinsa Arimasu
synopsis: Akira Isomori, a completely normal 32-year-old salaryman, suddenly turns into a woman.

title: Yareba Dekiruko

synonyms: You Can Do It if You Try

synopsis: The home tutor of every school-boy's dreams!!

title: Matsurika Kanriden
synopsis:
Matsurika, a female officer in the Inner Palace, had a little special skill, and that was "a better memory" than others. One day, she accepted a request to become a practice partner for a marriage meeting of a certain son of a distinguished family. However, the one who appeared was the Emperor, Hakuyou, who wanted to try having a marriage meeting?! And interested in Matsurika's special skill, Hakuyou even said, "For now, go and pass the civil exam"...?!

A Chinese-style Cinderella story between an emperor and a girl!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Kaiten Mokuba
synopsis: Simon and his adopted brother Guy vie for the love of their beautiful childhood friend (and also the destined fiancé of Simon) Muriel.

title: Go Go Bokutachi
synopsis: Atsu does not join any clubs in his school because he wants to find a part-time job. However, a club name "Lounge Lizard Club", which is famous for having pretty boys as members, comes to invite him to join. More astonishingly, the leader of the club expresses his affection towards Atsu openly in the public...

title: Lemon Angel
synopsis:
This is a heart filled and a little sexy story revolving around a high school girl Medaka Ogawa, and her friends Satomi and Rie. Join the trio on their high school experiences as they unfold. This is a story for the ages!!

(Source: Media Do International/Beaglee)

title: Natural
synopsis:
Sunao Miyahara wants to enter the world of show-business. She starts modeling and, thanks to her naturalness and expressiveness, she manages to overcome her rivals.

(Source: MU)

title: Gin no Oni
synopsis:
Natsuno Fubuki is an ordinary female high school student who yearns for her homeroom Shimakage Decade. But she had a secret. When she was young, she met a silver demon that eats the hearts of women, and said, "When I grow up, I will come to eat you."

Fubuki, whose parents were absent and saw the demon on transfer student Zenzo Chikamatsu, relocated to a ten-year-old house, but only ten years was the silver demon himself. In the decade when she loves blowing while she watches, she tries to make it a bride. Fubuki rebounds violently while being hit by him.

title: Chord Duet
synopsis:
Cattleya is a young swordwoman searching for the culprit behind a series of random killings. She suspects a man called Yajou, but is surprised when he offers to find the real culprit. What is the truth behind the random.

(Source: MU)

title: Tensei Danzou Oujo wa Kekkon Aite wo Sagasanai

alternative_titles.en: The Reincarnated Cross Dressing Princess Cannot Find a Marriage Partner
alternative_titles.ja: 転生男装王女は結婚相手を探さない

synopsis:
"Until we graduate, become mine. Or even If I do this——" Princess Alicia hates the idea of a political marriage, so her mother offers her an alternative crossdress and enter the boys-only magic academy, and choose one of the suitors to be her fiancé! Though it sounds impossible, Alicia fell in love with Lucius, an incredibly handsome gentleman who isn’t even a potential suitor. Yet somehow, Lucius knew right away that Alicia was a girl, and stole a kiss! Alicia reincarnated into another world based on her beloved BL short novel, and her path to romance begins…! After much anticipation, everyone’s favorite romance fantasy has become a manga!

(Source: Endless Journey)

synopsis: "Forever with You" - a collection of the famous manga artist Naoki Yamamoto. The two works presented in this collection are made in the characteristic style of the narrative's bleak and attention to detail. The first story is called "Forever With You" tells the story of a girl who falls into a stranger's apartment. In the second we watch the girl who dreams of a very strange dream. Unremarkable at first glance subjects translate into unexpected endings.

title: Boku no Lucky Star
synopsis:
As a member of a wolf clan, Kiyoto uses his human form to "emigrate" in order to join an idol group and find himself a bride! However, far from being welcomed by his fellow group member Motoharu, it seems like Motoharu hates him. Kiyoto works hard in the lessons while hiding his secret, but on the night of a full moon, he can't hold back his instincts and ends up pushing Motoharu down on the bed...!

(Source: Renta!)

title: Kimi no Wasurekata wo Oshiete

synonyms: Tell Me How to Forget About You
alternative_titles.ja: キミの忘れかたを教えて

synopsis:
Shuu Matsumoto, a college-dropout living the NEET life, felt it wasn't worth living anymore. At the invitation of his friend Tomi, he decides to visit his hometown and his old high school. A chance encounter with childhood friend turned celebrity, Sayane Kiriyama, turns the wheels of Shuu's fate once again.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Cha-K-Ra
synopsis:
A shape-shifter wolf who was once a human, but became a demi-immortal when his lover betrayed and murdered him adopted an orphaned boy, who is now a young man. They travel together, exorcising evil spirits and demons. Trouble follows and finds them often, but they always manage to come out on the other side, pretty much intact.
(from B-U)

title: Haikei Heika, 2-dome no Ouhi wa Okotowari!

synonyms: Your Majesty, I Refuse to Become a Royal Wife for the Second Time!
Haikei Heika, Nidome no Ouhi wa Okotowari!
alternative_titles.ja: 拝啓陛下、２度目の王妃はお断り！

synopsis:
Alicia is a duke's daughter who is meant to be the second wife for the young king. However, the king and his wife passed away so suddenly and left the throne to his younger brother, Julian. So, she promises to stay with Julian, who is younger than her, until the kingdom has recovered, but courteous Julian is actually mean, and planning to take her as his wife?!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Mannen D-Rank no Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi de Densetsu no Ken wo Hikkonuku

synonyms: Eternal D-Ranked Middle-aged Adventurer, Pulls Out the Legendary Sword While Drunk.
alternative_titles.ja: 万年Dランクの中年冒険者、酔った勢いで伝説の剣を引っこ抜く

synopsis:
Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.

(Source: MangaDex)

title: Mister Zipangu
synopsis:
This series is about three of Japan's most famous historical figures...when they were teenagers. Oda Nobunaga will one day be known as the "Demon King," and go on to become the first of the "Three Great Unifiers." But in 1548, he's still the carefree heir of the Owari Province. His companions are Toyotomi Hideyoshi, and the young child-hostage Tokugawa Ieyasu. Meanwhile, Japan is steeped in war and intrigue. Mr. Zipangu is a fresh and humourous retelling of Nobunaga's life: read and see!

(Source: Fifay Scanlations)

title: Shinogono Iwazu ni Watashi ni Amaete ireba Iino!

synonyms: Don't Say Anything, Just Let Me Spoil You!
alternative_titles.ja: シノゴノ言わずに私に甘えていればいーの！

title: Mori no Animal Company Anikan

alternative_titles.ja: 森のアニマルカンパニー アニカン

synopsis:
Bunny-kun takes a shortcut through the woods and gets trapped by a tiger who decides to "eat him up". But when the creature that comes to his rescue is a lion...

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: Kimi no Kotoba
synopsis: Kimi no Kotoba is a collection of short stories which revolve around Miina in SayoPony World, a land like the real world but with a mix of surreal, fantasy elements. The stories follow her daily school life and adventures with her friends and bandmates Ayumin and Nacchan, as well as her budding romance with her classmate Megane-kun.

title: Untitled Blue

alternative_titles.ja: アンタイトル・ブルー

synopsis:
Akari Ogihara (24), who gives up her dream of becoming a Japanese painter and works to support her family, helps a man who has attempted suicide in the sea one day. The only thing that a man of unknown age and name can tell is that he has a talent for Japanese painting. For some reason, she lent to the man her name Akari Ogihara" and somehow starts to sell Japanese paintings...?

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Itazura - Ijiwaru Tenshi

alternative_titles.ja: 悪戯　イジワル天使

synopsis: Ijiwaru Tenshi Ayumi is a high school student. Her friend's brother, Shouma, is younger than her, but he looks handsome and older! Shouma asks Ayumi for her digits right off the bat, and he's smooth like a player--not really Ayumi's type. The more time she spends with him, though, the more she likes him. But is Shouma really sent from heaven... or is he just a tease? (Source: ShoujoMagic)

title: Shiawase na Hada
synopsis: None Yet.

title: Magic Boots
synopsis:
What do you get when you mix together a wacky wizard, a girl who loves fairy tales, and a pair of enchanted footwear? Anything can happen to those who wear these magical boots which have "unlimited power", and things get crazy (crazily funny) when love goes awry in this cute, two-chapter story by Wujian and Wulin.

(Source: MU)

title: Black Alice
synopsis:
The manga centers on Alice, who might be a friend to humanity, but also might be an enemy. She approaches others about their worries, and helps them to make their wishes come true with magical items. But those with evil in their hearts misuse the items, and their wishes backfire.

(Source: ANN)

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Beauty Suppli, Itsudemo Issho
Volume 2: Recycle Appli, Kusari Onna
Volume 3: Migawari Appli

alternative_titles.ja: カムイ伝全集 第二部

title: 放課後
synopsis: An after school romance of two girls.

title: Power Stone
synopsis: An ancient legend tells of a magical Powerstone that granted its owner any wish desired. Adventurers from all over the globe clash as they seek this mystical gem.

title: Diamond no Jouken
synopsis:
Fujishiro Tatsuto is roped into working for the relatively unknown, yet talented photographer Araki Yousuke to repay the cost of a broken camera lens.  After school, Tatsuto works as a camera assistant and is captivated by Yousuke’s technique and communication with his models.  However, one day Yousuke turns the camera on Tatsuto and asks him to be a model.

(Source: shinkeikaku)

title: Lesson XX

synonyms: レッスン ダブルエックス

synopsis:
The story of Lesson XX has a sweet feel to it. It revolves around two boys, Shizuka and Sakura who are friends at a coed boarding school. One day, Shizuka happens to notice Sakura’s sheer beauty when he dives in to take a hit from a baseball. After some mixed up thoughts of who Sakura likes, Shizuka tells him he wishes to kiss him as a joke. But Sakura doesn’t care; he still insists that the two kiss under the starry sky. After this incident, Shizuka thinks it’s best for the two to be away from each other, so as to sort out their thoughts and real feelings. A classic shounen ai/yaoi, incorporating love, misunderstanding, violence and somewhat angst with a sweet end to it.

(Source: ANN)
